thread.title: Emerson Ecologics Announces wellevate(SM) Online Patient Dispensary
thread.title_full: Emerson Ecologics Announces wellevate(SM) Online Patient Dispensary

author: admin
title: Emerson Ecologics Announces wellevate(SM) Online Patient Dispensary
text:
Emerson Ecologics, LLC 
MANCHESTER, N.H., Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Emerson Ecologics, LLC announced wellevate(SM ), the company's next-generation online patient dispensary, at the American Association of Naturopathic Physician's annual national conference in Oakland, CA. Aimed at supporting integrative practitioners as they strive to improve patient compliance, extend their in-office dispensary and increase the efficiency of their practices, wellevate(SM) is a safe and secure solution to help practitioners achieve success. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20140115/NE47098LOGO 
Along with the announcement, the Emerson team demonstrated how practitioners can invite patients to the wellevate(SM) platform, share personalized recommendation information including a custom tool for dosage, frequency and timing instructions, and review their practice information through a quick-view patient/business dashboard. 
"The response from naturopathic physicians and other integrative practitioners at the AANP show was very positive - and their feedback and suggestions will be incorporated into our future development," said Andy Greenawalt, President and CEO for Emerson Ecologics. "Our goal is to be fully responsive to our customers, and wellevate( SM) is just one example of our commitment to building a suite of tools to support integrative practitioners and their practices." 
Integrative practitioners who are interested in receiving updates on the upcoming launch of wellevate(SM) can register on www.wellevate.me . 
About Emerson Ecologics Founded in 1980, Emerson Ecologics, LLC is committed to the success of integrative healthcare practitioners as they deliver unsurpassed patient care. As a dedicated partner, Emerson Ecologics offers its customers the broadest selection of professional-quality products, and continues to expand its comprehensive suite of educational and practice management tools to help practitioners achieve success. Headquartered in Manchester, NH with distribution centers in Virginia and California, Emerson Ecologics is NSF certified, VAWD accredited and is the founder of the Emerson Quality Program(Â®). For more information, visit emersonecologics.com. 
Contact: Director of Marketing, Emerson Ecologics800.654.4432
